R

RandomAccessByteReader - Class in common
Performs random-access reading of primitive data types from a byte array.
RandomAccessByteReader(byte[]) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader
Constructs an instance to read from the specified byte array, starting at index 0.
RandomAccessByteReader(byte[], ByteOrder) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader
Constructs an instance to read from the specified byte array, starting at index 0, using the given byte order.
RandomAccessByteReader(byte[], int) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader
Constructs an instance to read from the specified byte array, starting at the given offset.
RandomAccessByteReader(byte[], int, ByteOrder) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader
Constructs an instance to read from the specified byte array, starting at the given offset, using the specified byte order.
RandomAccessByteReader3 - Class in common
This class performs reader operations intended for obtaining data from a byte array at random.
RandomAccessByteReader3(byte[]) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader3
Constructs an instance to store the specified byte array containing the payload data to be read from the beginning of the array.
RandomAccessByteReader3(byte[], ByteOrder) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader3
Constructs an instance to store the byte array containing payload data and the byte order to interpret the input bytes correctly.
RandomAccessByteReader3(byte[], int) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader3
Constructs an instance to store a byte array that contains payload or raw data.
RandomAccessByteReader3(byte[], int, ByteOrder) - Constructor for class common.RandomAccessByteReader3
Constructs an instance to store the specified byte array containing payload data and the byte order to interpret the input bytes correctly.
RationalNumber - Class in common
This class represents a rational number, typically used in the TIFF image format.
RationalNumber(int, int, RationalNumber.DataType) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
Constructs an instance to handle both signed and unsigned integers.
RationalNumber(long, long, RationalNumber.DataType) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
A private constructor for methods such as negate() that create instances of this class using the content of the current instance.
RationalNumber(int, int) - Constructor for class common.RationalNumber
Constructs an instance to store signed integers.
